name: HousingInstabilityDiagnosesSNOMEDCT
title: Housing Instability Diagnoses SNOMED CT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: "<insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the diagnoses associated with housing instability as identified by the Gravity Project"),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR implementation guide as well as other uses of this SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Housing instability due to imminent risk of homelessness (finding)
Housing instability due to frequent change in place of residence (finding)
Housing instability due to being behind on payments for place of residence (finding)
Housing instability due to threat of eviction (finding)
Housing instability due to housing cost burden (finding)

contains.display: Housing instability due to imminent risk of homelessness (finding)

Housing instability due to being behind on payments for place of residence (finding)

Housing instability due to housing cost burden (finding)
